exercise.rubric: Choose the correct words to complete the sentences.

questions.sentence: We have the best products. They're very [high] quality.
The shop has a [wide] choice of football shirts: all the big teams.
This room is $100. We have more [expensive] rooms at $200.
DHL have really [fast] delivery times. They deliver in 24 hours.
The office is in a [bad] location: an hour from the city centre!
We need new computers because our technology isn't [up-to-date].
